评论概述: Comfortable and easy to take care of
评论详情: I love these shirts, and now have six of them. They come out of the wash and dryer in perfect condition with no wrinkles. They are a nice loose-ish Fit in are flattering.

评论概述: Amazing shirt for golf or otherwise!
评论详情: I have now purchased four of these shirts in various colors and patterns because I love them so much! The material is thin and moisture wicking, but not see-through. I am 5'6" and weigh between 160-165 lbs. 36D bra size. I have worn two of these shirts to separate golf outings, but they are also perfect for everyday summer use on the boat. They are very comfortable and fit nicely. I have washed them a few times and let them air dry with no pilling or shrinkage. I normally wear a medium shirt, but did purchase a large in this and feel that it fits perfectly. I purchased the large mainly to accommodate a D bust size.... I potentially could have gone to a medium but I'm happy with this fit.
It’s a nice work out shirt, thin and light weight. Love the zipper and color. Simple. Unfortunately the small is too big, it’s not fitted at all- returned it.

Purchased this shirt for a recent golf tournament I was in and it was both comfortable and kept me cool while the temperature for the day reached 84 degrees. Love the style, colors and way it looks. Great shirt and great price. Love it! True to size as well.
Love the shirt! Fits perfectly and quality is great!

This review is for: LURANEE Women's Short Sleeve Moisture Wicking Athletic Shirts Quarter Zip Pullover. The product arrived on time and is in excellent shape.  It smells like someone sprayed it with heavily with perfume, I washed it twice (once with vinegar) to try to get rid of the smell, but it will need a third wash to hopefully get the smell out.  I purchased a size up and the shirt fits nicely, the zipper can be up for a higher neckline or lowered for more of a v-neck appearance.  It's a cute top and would order others if the smell would not have been so horrid.
Fit great!  No too clingy, and not too big.  Very comfortable to bowl in😃.
Material is nice, size is good, colors are perfect!
Great shirt.  Our golf team of 14 each purchased this shirt and it was a hit.
I liked the feel and fit of the shirt.
Nice fit nice golf top Medium 5’4 140

Comfortable and fits well. The inside is not printed or lined, so when you lay the zipped collar down it shows. That isn’t ideal, but isn’t a deal breaker for me. The fabric feels a little swimwear-like, but again wasn’t a deal breaker.
Color was listed as marble but it appears to be navy instead of black??  Fit is good but wrinkles a bit horizontally at bottom of zipper.  Sleeves are comfortable and length is good.
I love this shirt. Great fabric, been in dozen of washes and still looks as new.
Perfect short for active person whether it’s golfing, hiking or another activity. Shirt is quick dry, doesn’t wrinkle, and travels well.
Sizes aren’t true
Loved the color and fit of this shirt

I like it and the colors are great. The collar is a bit flimsy and needs help to fold and lay right. The zip up opening may have something to do with that. Overall, I pleased. Its hard to find sports shirts in a print.
The fit and the fabric are awesome.
I am 130 lb,  32A and a medium was way too tight under the arms I had to go to a size large. I like the shirt a lot. nice quality seems very comfortable and good quality.
Nice looking, fits well, and smooth material.
I wear a size Large, and that's what I ordered.  The shirt was incredibly small. There's no way I could get this thing on.  It's unfortunate because the shirt itself seemed to be of good quality.
Material is nice. Fits nicely however it is long!  I am 5’8” 175 bought a large. It’ goes down to my hips and is not flattering. Does not hug the hips but is loose and I have big hips!
True to size.  Looks nice, good purchase.
This shirt is cool and comfortable and very pretty. Much less expensive than purpose-made riding shirts with similar performance. Very pleased with this purchase.

Love this shirt! It's very light weight and well made. I usually wear L or XL (5'5" 165 lbs). I bought a XL to play it safe as I have broad shoulders and long torso. It was a perfect fit! I will definitely be purchasing more of these awesome shirts. I highly recommend.
This shirt is nice looking. I have the white leaf blue. Although this shirt has 50+ UPF it didn't really feel breathable.
As advertised.  I wear for golf and pickleball.  Comfortable and accurate size and fit.
Top is exactly like it is in the picture. Wears nicely.
Purchased for a National Doubles bowling event - this shirt was cool and comfortable
I ordered 2 of these shirt in long sleeves for an Alaska trip in June. You can hand wash them easily. I got so many compliments on them I ordered 2 more for a summer trip. great value.

The neck when zippered is a little stiff and loose on me but I ordered a small and I really needed a xs Please add xs sizing. Overall I really like these, have a short sleeved and a 3/4 sleeved one. Would recommend.
This fits well and I plan to purchase more in other patterns.
Soft material, not clingy
I love these shirts! I play disc golf and they are the most comfortable and flexible shirts I’ve tried
Very nice material that is cool to the skin. The pattern is very unique and I can wear it with multiple bottoms of different colors in the shirt. It fits great as well.
Lightweight wicking fabric. The style is a bit long for my liking, but a nice fit overall.
Good color and washes well. Fit is flattering.
Comfortable and good sizing

I will definitely be buying more colors soon and told others I got them on Amazon!
The shirt is sporty and stylish! It looks great with gym shorts or regular shorts.
There is no company logo, but it’s not a problem for me…. I love the color, material and the shape of the blouse…

The colors are like the description and true to size.  I washed it before wearing it and did not shrink.  I am 5.2, weight 125 and bought a size small.  It is a little long for my height but works ok for me.  It’s not tight.
Great golf shirts.  Very comfortable.
Fits perfect, exactly as described!  Great quality, moisture wicking fabric and helps keep you cool when working outside in the Texas heat!!  I highly recommend!!!

This shirt is just what I was looking for, I love the zip up with collar. I am using it for bicycling. I got the X-Large because I didn’t want a tight fit (in the stomach area) and it’s perfect. Just like one I got from vineyard vines only much much less$$

评论概述: Runs very small and shirt tail is more rounded and pronounced than in the picture
评论详情: I usually wear small, but ordered up to a medium. Size medium fits like a snug small. Also curved bottom hem is much more pronounced than in the picture. No idea why they make so many extra long shirts with super curved bottoms. So unbecoming! Seems like good quality but will be returning.
The fit was excellent and the design modern and flattering

This shirt is super stretchy and fits true to size. Very flattering. The zipper works well. The length is a bit longer than described but that is just an added bonus. Overall, very nice shirt for the money.

like the fit and material. Not to tight but had a nice slim fit not boxy. For reference I am 5 ft 2 in and 124 lbs. Was looking for something that would pack well and look nice with casual around town in the heat. Color was great as well.

I ordered a medium, true to size. The material was lite and comfortable. It stayed in place so it did not interfere in my golf game with tugging and riding up the back. Great shirt. I am going to buy a few more in different prints.
Not as lite as I’m use to but lots of compliments and pretty cute!

Perfect fit. Soft fabric

This shirt is very comfortable and I love the paisley pattern!  You can dress it up or dress it down.
Soft and as pictured.  My only issue is that the gray one fits better than the white &black.  The white & black one fits tighter than I would like.

This is a very comfortable and beautiful top.  Fits perfectly and looks exactly as pictured online!

I ordered almost every color and print in this top. They wash and dry well and are moisture wicking. I am very pleased with how they fit and the colors offered. I wear them constantly and get tons of compliments. They are true to size and you will be very pleased with the quality of the color and tailoring. They have not faded at all with many washes.
I must confess I had to send this back the sizing is small. My aunt loved these shirts so I thought I would try them. I would reorder but didn’t have my size.

I wear it as a workout shirt. I am 60 years old, 5' 6" 139 pounds, medium. I like that it is light weight and stylish.

I typically wear a Lg, but after reading some reviews I decided to go with XL. It has plenty of room without being too baggy.
